pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:5.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:5.2: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ aññataraṃ kulaṃ ubhatopasannaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:5.3: Saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati, yaṃ tasmiṃ kule uppajjati purebhattaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā taṃ sabbaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vissajjetvā appekadā anasitā acchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:5.5: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:5.6: Ime imesaṃ datvā appekadā anasitā acchantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:6.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:6.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:6.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:6.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, yaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati evarūpassa kulassa ñattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:7.2: Itthannāmaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:7.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:8.2: Itthannāmaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:8.4: Yassāyasmato khamati itthannāmassa kulassa sekkhasammutiyā dānaṃ, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:9.2: Khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:10.1: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:11.1: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:11.2: ‘gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:12.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:13.1: Tena kho pana samayena sāvatthiyaṃ ussavo hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:13.5: “paṭikkhittaṃ bhagavatā sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjitun”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:13.7: “kiṃ nu kho nāma amhākaṃ jīvitena yaṃ ayyā amhākaṃ na paṭiggaṇhantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:14.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:14.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:14.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:14.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, nimantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:14.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:15.1: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:15.2: ‘gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:16.1: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:17.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu tassa kulassa kulūpako hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:17.2: Atha kho so bhikkhu pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:17.4: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu gilāno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:17.5: Atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:17.8: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ animantitena sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjitun”ti kukkuccāyanto na paṭiggahesi;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:18.1: Atha kho so bhikkhu ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:18.3: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:18.4: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, gilānena bhikkhunā sekkhasammatesu kulesu khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādituṃ bhuñjituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:18.5: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:19.1: “Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulāni, yo pana bhikkhu tathārūpesu sekkhasammatesu kulesu pubbe animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādeyya vā bhuñjeyya vā, paṭidesetabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:19.2: ‘gārayhaṃ, āvuso, dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ, taṃ paṭidesemī’”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:20.1: Yāni kho pana tāni sekkhasammatāni kulānīti
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:20.2: sekkhasammataṃ nāma kulaṃ yaṃ kulaṃ saddhāya vaḍḍhati, bhogena hāyati. Evarūpassa kulassa ñattidutiyena kammena sekkhasammuti dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:21.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:23.2: ajjatanāya vā svātanāya vā animantito, gharūpacāraṃ okkamante nimanteti, eso animantito nāma.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:28.2: pañca bhojanāni—odano, kummāso, sattu, maccho, maṃsaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:29.1: Animantito agilāno “khādissāmi bhuñjissāmī”ti paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pd3:30.3: sekkhasammate asekkhasammatasaññī animantito agilāno khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khādati vā bhuñjati vā, āpatti pāṭidesanīyassa.
